description:
XPG and ADATA are making a handheld gaming PC with a tilting screen, Foveated Rendering and swappable ram using a CAMM2 Module! Known as the XPG Nia can this new handheld compete with the steam Deck and the ASUS ROG Ally X? Plus we also saw a new unbranded handheld known as the SIX United 5 that looks like a mix of the MSI CLaw and ROG Ally.

Check out Baldy Rudy On Youtube: https://m.youtube.com/@baldlyrudy/videos

title: XPG Nia Hands On First Look, & Foveated Rendering, LPCAMM2 Ram, Tilt Screen
